Fire in island camp injures eight Rohingya refugeesEight Rohingya refugees were injured on Saturday in a fire that broke out due to a gas leak at a camp on the remote Bhasan Char island on Saturday, police said. Pope cancels Saturday meetings because of mild flu - VaticanPope Francis cancelled his meetings on Saturday because of mild flu, the Vatican said in a statement. Yulia Navalnaya demands authorities release husband's body, calls Putin's faith 'fake'Yulia Navalnaya, the widow of the late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, on Saturday demanded that Russian authorities release his body for burial and accused a "demonic" Russian President Vladimir Putin of "torturing" his corpse. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 08:09:28 GMT LOH2EJBIKNPIJJ2MSVUNHCK73Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/yulia-navalnaya-demands-authorities-release-husbands-body-calls-putins-faith-2024-02-24/Reuters世界欧洲
Flooded Greek lake a warning to European farmers battling climate changeSitting in a small motorboat, farmer Babis Evangelinos glides over land he once cultivated on the Thessaly plain in central Greece, the nearby trunks of his fruitless almond trees submerged by floodwater. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 08:05:37 GMT YDOBGXTFQRLSJM64IZHODKAYK4 https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/flooded-greek-lake-warning-european-farmers-battle-climate-change-2024-02-24/Angeliki Koutantou可持续发展气候与能源
Angry French farmers storm into agriculture fair in ParisA group of French farmers stormed into a major Paris farm fair on Saturday ahead of a planned visit by President Emmanuel Macron amid anger over costs, red tape and green regulations.
